title: Ticket #6169: make the number of retries for the credmon polling configurable
description:
In some cases, there can be fairly significant delays for the CREDMON to produce a credential file, and the CREDD should be able to be configured to poll for longer than 20 seconds if desired.

I propose adding the configuration setting CREDD_POLLING_TIMEOUT to make this configurable. The interval is still exactly one second, but this is all non-blocking now.
